quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Scheme for Viability Gap Funding (VGF) for development of Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS)?
1. BESS projects of total 4,000 MWh to be developed by 2026-27 through competitive bidding.
2. Financial support of up to 50% of capital cost as budgetary support to be given in form of Viability Gap Funding (VGF).
3. Level playing field to be provided for both public and private sector entities.

Cabinet approved the Scheme titled Viability Gap Funding for development of Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS). To ensure that the benefits of the scheme reach the consumers, a minimum of _____ of the BESS project capacity will be made available to Distribution Companies (Discoms). This will not only enhance the integration of renewable energy into the electricity grid but also minimize wastage while optimizing the utilization of transmission networks.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the above scheme? 1. Phase I to provide all-weather access to eligible unconnected habitations with population up to 500 in plain area. 2. In 2014, Rural Connectivity Projects for Left Wing Extremism Affected Areas (RCPLWEA) launched as separate vertical. 3. The unit for this Programme is a Panchayat.
options: Only 1
Only 2
1 and 2
2 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme? 1. It covers only rural areas - only single road connectivity to be provided. 2. No roads can be taken up under Phase-III before completion of 5 years of design life . 3. An Unconnected Habitation is one which is located at a distance of at least 100 metre or more (1 km of path distance in case of Hills) from an All-weather road or a connected Habitation.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)? A. The third phase of PMGSY has been launched for the period starting from 2019-20 to 2024-25. B. The Phase-3 target is to consolidate 1,25,000 km of roads. C. Phase-2 of scheme was approved in 2013, aiming to consolidate 10000 km of existing rural road network.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the number of clusters which are aimed to be created under the Shyama Prasad Mukherji Rurban Mission (SPMRM)?
options: 100
200
300
400
500

quiz.text:
The objective of the Shyama Prasad Mukherji Rurban Mission (SPMRM) is to stimulate local economic development, enhance basic services, and create well planned Rurban clusters. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct about Rurban Clusters?
1. Village/gram panchayat which are growth centers with resources available in area that could potentially lead economic transformation are identified.
2. Cluster are geographically contiguous villages with a population of  about 25000 to 50000 in desert, hilly or tribal areas.
3.  Geographically contiguous Villages of about 50000 to 75000 Population in plain and coastal areas is taken under cluster.
Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Shyama Prasad Mukherji Rurban Mission (SPMRM)?
options: (A) One of mission outcome is bridging rural-urban divide-viz: economic, technological and those related to facilities and services
(B) Integrated Cluster Action Plans (ICAPs) prepared by State Governments, lays down development aspirations of cluster
(C) Government of India provides support known as Viability Gap Funding to clusters to supplement shortfall in funding available through various Government schemes
(D) Aibawk cluster in  Aizwal district of Mizoram - first cluster to be completed under SPMRM

quiz.text:
Which of the following statemen(s) is/are correct with respect to Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)?
1. Beneficiaries are Rural Youth between 18 - 35 Years, while upper age limit for SC/ST/ Women/ Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Groups / Persons with Disabilities (PwDs), Trangender and other special groups is 45 Years.
2. It is a Sub-scheme under National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP).
3. It is a placement linked skilling program.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Key Features of Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)?

1. Shifting Emphasis from Training to Career Progression - incentives for job termination, career progression and foreign placements.

2. Greater Support for Placed Candidates - Post-placement support, migration support and alumni network to enable farm to factory transition

3. Outcome Led Design - Guaranteed Placement for at least 50% trained candidates and moving towards minimum mandatory certification (Industrial Internship for 12 months).

Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY) is a placement linked skill development program for rural poor youth. It has Inclusive Program Design with  Mandatory coverage of socially disadvantaged groups - SC/ST:___ ; Minority:___ ; Women:___.
Start-up Village Entrepreneurship Programme (SVEP) aims to provide direct employment to how many people in India?
options: 1 crore
2 crore
3 crore
4 crore
5 crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Start-up Village Entrepreneurship Programme (SVEP)?
1. It is a sub-scheme under Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Rural Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NRLM).
2. Only new enterprises will be supported under SVEP.
3. Sustainable livelihoods and self-employment opportunities with financial assistance and training in business management and soft skills to be provided.
Which of the following statement is incorrect in reference to Start-up Village Entrepreneurship Programme (SVEP)?
options: (A) Block to act as unit of implementation
(B) Maximum 2000 enterprises can be supported in 1 Block
(C) Cadre of Community Resource Persons- Enterprise Promotion (CRP-EP) promoted to provide business support services to enterprises
(D) It promotes both individual and group enterprises, set-up and promote enterprises majorly on manufacturing, trading and service sectors
(E) It addresses 3 major pillars of rural start-ups namely - finances, incubation and skill ecosystems

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to above scheme?
1. Objective is to promote Integrated Nutrient Management i.e. balanced and judicious use of fertilizers.
2.  It is merged in Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY) as its one component under name ‘Soil Health & Fertility’ from 2020-21.
3.  Slogan of the scheme is Swasth Dharaa Khet Haraa.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Soil Health Card (SHC) Scheme?
1. A Soil Health Card provides information on nutrient status of soil, along with recommendations on dosage of nutrients to be utilised for improving its fertility and health.
2. It was launched in 2016.
3. It is provided to all farmers in country at an interval of 2 years.

Soil Health Card provides information to farmers on nutrient status of their soil along with recommendation on appropriate dosage of nutrients to be applied for improving soil health and its fertility. It is a Printed report which contains nutrient status of soil with respect to ____ parameters, having ___ macro nutrient.
Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Village Level Soil Testing Labs (VLSTLs) under above scheme?
options: (A) Aim is to popularize soil test analysis in campaign mode and to create awareness among farmers about soil health.
(B) Focus is on providing service at doorstep to farmers.
(C) Target is to establish 15000 labs in 3 years (2023-26).
(D) Beneficiary should be 12th pass with Science and knowledge of computer.

quiz.text: Pradhan Mantri-Dakshta Aur Kushalta Sampann Hitgrahi Yojana aims to enhance competency level of the target groups to make them employable both in self- employment and wage-employment for their socio-economic development. For Eligibility under the scheme age should be between ____.
options: 18-50 years
18-45 years
15-21 years
18-40 years
15-45 years

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Pradhan Mantri Dakshata Aur Kushalata Sampanna Hitgrahi (PM-DAKSH) Yojana?
1. Other Backward Classes (OBCs) having Annual Family Income (AFI) below ₹1 Lakh are eligible under the scheme.
2. Existing Scheme of Assistance to skilling for OBCs/EBCs/DNTs modified with inclusion of SCs and Safai karamcharis including Waste pickers and renamed as PM-DAKSH Yojana.
3. There is separate provision for setting up training institutions.
Which of the following statement is incorrect about Skilling Programmes under Pradhan Mantri Dakshata Aur Kushalata Sampanna Hitgrahi (PM-DAKSH) Yojana?
options: (A) Under Up-skilling/Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL), target groups are Marginal rural artisans and other entrepreneurs who constitute bottom of pyramid
(B) Under Short Term Courses (focus on wage/self-employment), target groups are Most disempowered groups who are illiterate/semi-illiterate and unemployed
(C) Overall placement under under Short Term Courses of  trained persons should be 70% in wage/self employment
(D) In Long Term Courses (for Global Class Skills) SC, OBC, EBC, DNT youth etc. who have been educated up to 12th class are target groups

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the above scheme? 1.This scheme was launched in the year 2022.
 2. Through Composite Medical Health, it provides a comprehensive package in convergence with PM-ABHIM supporting Gender-Reaffirmation surgeries through selected hospitals.
 3. It provides Scholarships for Transgender Students studying in Class XI and till post-graduation.
 4. It has provisions for Skill Development and Livelihood under STRIVE scheme.
options: All  of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Central Sector Scheme for Comprehensive Rehabilitation for Welfare of Transgender Persons under SMILE - Support for Marginalised Individuals for Livelihood and Enterprise?
1. Financial Outlay for this component is Rs. 100 crore.
2. Housing in form of ‘Garima Greh’ to provide shelter with basic amenities like food, medical care, and recreational facilities and support for capacity-building/skill development.
3. Transgender Protection Cell in each state to be established to monitor cases of offences.

Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Central Sector Scheme for Comprehensive Rehabilitation of persons engaged in Act of Begging under SMILE - Support for Marginalised Individuals for Livelihood and Enterprise?
options: (A) Aim is to make places begging-free and make a strategy for comprehensive rehabilitation of persons engaged in Begging
(B) Survey and identification of  persons engaged in  Begging in identified places
(C) Any citizen of India engaged in  act of begging to be covered
(D) Orphan child engaged in Begging should be referred to Child Care Institutions (CCIs) of Ministry of Women and Child Development
(E) Dependent children of female beneficiary (male children upto 18 and girl children upto 21 years of age) are permitted to stay in  female shelter home

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Pradhan Mantri-Yuva Udyamita Vikas Abhiyan (PM-YUVA) Yojana?1. Aim is to promote entrepreneurship as an alternative career choice and enable sustained long-term mentoring support.2.  Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises is acting as Nodal Ministry.3. Social Entrepreneurship - Catalyse a culture shift to support aspiring entrepreneurs to be promoted under it.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect in reference to Pradhan Mantri-Yuva Udyamita Vikas Abhiyan (PM-YUVA) Yojana Pilot Project (from November 2019 to March 2022)?1. It was focused on students/trainees and alumni going into skilling ecosystem.2. Implemented through organizations having experience in entrepreneurship development, entrepreneurship training as well as mentoring and hand-holding.3. It was implemented in in 15 States and 5 Union Territories.
